summary: Three bickering brothers who don't get along reluctantly go on a cross country road trip together to deliver a car in time for their mother's birthday.
cast: Patrick Dempsey|Arye Gross|Daniel Stern|Annabeth Gish|Rita Taggart|Joseph Bologna|Alan Arkin|James Gammon|Ray Lykins|Chris Lombardi|Josh Segal|John Considine|Steve Boles|Don Tilley|Terry Loughlin|Fred Ornstein|Ried 'Pete' Shock|Rod Swift|Don Sheldon|Boots Crowder|Edan Gross|Dean Jacobson|Michael Weiner|Steve Alterman|Terrence Beasor|Joe Chapman|Brian K. Doughty|Judi M. Durand|Barbara Hey|Carol King|David McCharen|Larry Moss|Erin Ferdinand|Randy Herman|Robert B. Westerfield Jr.
title: Coupe de Ville
